get_connected.title: Get connected
get_connected.description: We’re here to help if you’ve hit an issue or even if you just have a question about CDAP.

items.title: Ask a question
items.body: You get in touch with the community using any of the following links:

items.title: Report a bug
items.body: Tracker. We recommend you to post your issues to the mailing list, and report a bug if it is confirmed as an issue there.

items.title: Join the BDAM group
items.body: community focused on solving real world problems using Big Data technologies.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: The CDAP community welcomes and greatly appreciates your contributions. To get started, view our contributing guide. Here are a few ways you can contribute to CDAP:

items.title: Get familiar
items.body: Start by fixing a simple issue

twitter.title: Stay informed
twitter.description: Stay informed about the latest news and announcements by following us on Twitter, subscribing to our YouTube channel, or meeting us at meetups and conferences.

announcement.title: Big Data Applications Meetup
announcement.description: Join us for the next Big Data Applications Meetup at Google San Francisco on 04/10.

announcement.title: Google Cloud Next ’19
announcement.description: We will also be available at the OSS Office Hours on 04/10 at Google Cloud Next ‘19 SF at Moscone Center
